Based on the user's preference cues and genre information provided, I would recommend 'What Women Want' (2000) as one potential recommendation.

I would recommend "Taxi Driver" as it is a classic and well-regarded film by director Martin Scorsese.

"Taxi Driver" tells the story of an taxi driver named Joe Pesci who becomes obsessed with a young woman named Dolores Costello who works at his employer's company in New York City.

Joe Pesci becomes increasingly violent and erratic as he attempts to win over Dolores Costello.

Throughout the film, Joe Pesc, along with several other individuals, engage in various acts of violence and criminal activity within New York City and its surrounding areas.
